about_the_game:
Manage a zombie colony. Mine, build, master new technologies, do everything to capture these pitiful people and their juicy brains!

Many years have passed since the mass infection and the transformation of humanity into zombies. Even though there are still survivors who are resisting, being a zombie is still boring. But what if... we build a new Zombie Social Society?

  • Develop your zombie settlement.
  • Research new undead technologies.
  • Make decisions in random events.
  • Keep an eye on the needs of the residents (yes, you thought zombies didn’t have needs?).
  • Try to turn uncouth fools into decent citizens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom II X4 with at least 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Phenom II X6 with at least 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660/Radeon HD 6970
